Package com.dcprogramming.game.networking

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dcprogramming.game.networking.Client

  • public class Client
extends java.lang.Object
    Version:
    1.5
    Author:
    50018003 By: Daniel Merryweather The Client class, establishes a connection to a desired server and recieves all packets in its packet manager

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      private static class  Client.Connection
      The connection thread establishes a connection separate from the main application so updates can be done asynchronously, after the connection has been made, basic information such as the username and team are exchanged initally
